Bernhard Seeger works as a professor in Department of Mathematics and Computer SciencePhilipps,University Marburg, and his\her h-index is 28, g-index is 113. His\Her interests are :
 Data Stream; Continuous Query; Indexation; Temporal Databases; Data Mining;
